name: io.modelcontextprotocol.anonymous/terraform-mcp-server
title: Terraform MCP Server
description: HashiCorp MCP server for executing Terraform Cloud and Enterprise workflows, resources, and tools.

environmentVariables.name: TFE_ADDRESS
environmentVariables.description: Terraform Cloud or Terraform Enterprise base URL.

environmentVariables.name: TFE_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: Terraform Cloud or Terraform Enterprise API token used to authenticate requests.

environmentVariables.name: TFE_SKIP_TLS_VERIFY
environmentVariables.description: Set to true to disable TLS verification when connecting to Terraform Cloud or Terraform Enterprise.

environmentVariables.name: TRANSPORT_MODE
environmentVariables.description: Selects the active transport; use streamable-http to serve HTTP clients.

environmentVariables.name: TRANSPORT_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Interface to bind when running in streamable-http mode.

environmentVariables.name: TRANSPORT_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Port to bind when running in streamable-http mode.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_ENDPOINT
environmentVariables.description: HTTP endpoint path exposed when streamable-http transport is enabled.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_SESSION_MODE
environmentVariables.description: Session management mode for the MCP server.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_ALLOWED_ORIGINS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS when using streamable-http transport.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_CORS_MODE
environmentVariables.description: CORS enforcement mode; strict enforces allowed origins while development trusts localhost.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TLS_CERT_FILE
environmentVariables.description: Path to the TLS certificate file to enable HTTPS for streamable-http transport.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TLS_KEY_FILE
environmentVariables.description: Path to the TLS key file to enable HTTPS for streamable-http transport.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_RATE_LIMIT_GLOBAL
environmentVariables.description: Global rate limit in requests-per-second:burst format applied across all sessions.

environmentVariables.name: MCP_RATE_LIMIT_SESSION
environmentVariables.description: Per-session rate limit in requests-per-second:burst format.

environmentVariables.name: ENABLE_TF_OPERATIONS
environmentVariables.description: Set to true to enable tools that execute Terraform operations requiring explicit approval.
